title: No results when searched via Package view selection and dialog
description: Search via Package view selection and dialog does not yield any results.
OB: When searching for declarations using the package view selection and dialog, the search is initialized with the fully qualified name. However, no results are found.
EB: When searching for declarations using the package view selection and dialog, the search should first try to get the Java element. If that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the package view. 
2. Select a package. 
3. Use the search dialog to search for declarations within the package.
